mapinfo.detailstext:
The Thar Desert is a waypoint for merchants in the silk road. In this big dry area, the fauna is scarce, but you will find for sure much copper to mine. As you can be really lost in the desert, you don't really know where your settlement is, and it may change every game. 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -Outlaws: Wokou Horseman / Wokou Ronin 
 -Natives: Udasi 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Rikikipu 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
